item.description:
August's event will be a SUNDAY Meetup.

This month's topic: What's so great about that?

Last month, in discussing bad writing, one thing we noticed is the matter of taste. What about good writing? Is it really just taste, or is there writing that everyone can agree earns our love?

Challenge: Bring a short sample of writing you think is wonderful.

Agenda:

4:00 Names.

Topic: What's so great about that?
Read your sample and let's see if we can figure out what makes it work and what parts of it fall flat. Don't be surprised if everyone has a different answer.

5:00 Break
**Please reserve off-topic discussion for after the break.

6:00 Go Home and Write!

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers August Meetup
